configuratorDevelopmentNotice.message: 您正在使用开发版本 Rotorflight 配置器。请考虑使用发布版本，除非你有很好的理由使用未发布的开发版本。
configuratorDevelopmentNotice.english:
You are using a development version of the Rotorflight Configurator.
Please consider using a released version, unless you have a good reason for using an unreleased development version.

configuratorUpdateNotice.message:
您正在使用旧版本的 Rotorflight配置程序。
$t(configuratorUpdateHelp.message)
configuratorUpdateNotice.english:
You are using an outdated version of the Rotorflight Configurator.
$t(configuratorUpdateHelp.message)

configuratorUpdateHelp.message:
在旧版本的配置程序上使用新版本固件可能会使修改某些设置时导致 固件配置损坏且直升机无法工作。此外，固件的某些功能将仅能在 CLI 中配置。
Rotorflight 配置程序版本$1 可下载，请访问这个页面下载并安装最新的配置程序，以获取全部的修复与改进。
更新前请关闭配置程序窗口。
configuratorUpdateHelp.english:
Using a newer version of the firmware with an outdated version of Configurator means that changing some settings will result in a corrupted firmware configuration and a non-working craft. Furthermore, some features of the firmware will only be configurable in CLI.
Rotorflight Configurator version $1 is available for download online, please visit this page to download and install the latest version with fixes and improvements.
Please close the configurator window before updating.

backupFileIncompatible.message: 上一版本配置程序生成的备份文件和当前版本的配置程序不兼容。
backupFileIncompatible.english: Backup file provided was generated for previous version of the configurator and is incompatible with this version of configurator. Sorry

backupFileUnmigratable.message: 上一版本配置程序生成的备份文件无法移植到当前版本的配置配置程序中，抱歉。
backupFileUnmigratable.english: Backup file provided was generated by a previous version of the configurator and is not migratable. Sorry.

$t(escProtocolDisabledMessage.message)

reportProblemsDialogACC_NEEDS_CALIBRATIO.message:
加速度计已启用，但未进行校准。
如果您打算使用加速度计，请遵循 "$t(tabSetup.message)" 页面中的 "$t(initialSetupButtonCalibrateAccel.message)" 操作指南。如果开启了任何需要调用加速度计的功能 (例如自稳模式, GPS 救援, …)，在加速度计完成校准之间将无法解锁。
如果您并不想使用加速度计，建议您在 "$t(tabConfiguration.message)" 页面中通过 "$t(configurationSystem.message)" 禁用加速度计。
reportProblemsDialogACC_NEEDS_CALIBRATIO.english:
the accelerometer is enabled but it is not calibrated.
If you plan to use the accelerometer, please follow the instructions for '$t(initialSetupButtonCalibrateAccel.message)' on the '$t(tabSetup.message)' tab. If any function that requires the accelerometer (auto level modes, GPS rescue, ...) is enabled, arming of the craft will be disabled until the accelerometer has been calibrated.
If you are not planning on using the accelerometer it is recommended that you disable it in '$t(configurationSystem.message)' on the '$t(tabConfiguration.message)' tab.

defaultWelcomeIntro.message: 欢迎使用 Rotorflight - 配置程序，为简化固件升级，设置和调校飞控而生的工具。
defaultWelcomeIntro.english: Welcome to Rotorflight - Configurator, a utility designed to simplify updating, configuring and tuning of your flight controller.

defaultDownloadsText.message:
最新的 Rotorflight 配置器软件下载在这里：
  • Rotorflight 配置器
  • Rotorflight 黑盒子查看工具
  • LUA 调参脚本（EdgeTX & OpenTx）
  • LUA 调参脚本（睿斯凯Ethos）
Rotorflight是开源 固件，代码可以在 GitHub 中找到。
defaultDownloadsText.english:
The latest Rotorflight software downloads are available here:
  • Rotorflight Configurator
  • Rotorflight Blackbox Log Viewer
  • LUA Scripts for EdgeTx & OpenTx
  • LUA Scripts for FrSky Ethos
Rotorflight is Open Source software. The source code is available in GitHub.

defaultCommunityText.message: Rotorflight 有一个活跃的在线社区，由普通用户、专业飞行员和开发人员组成。
defaultCommunityText.english: Rotorflight has an active online community of normal users, pro-pilots, and developers.

defaultWebsiteText.message: Rotorflight 官网 是说明、指南和公告的主要网站
defaultWebsiteText.english: Rotorflight website is the first stop for instructions, manuals, and information.

defaultDiscordText.message: Discord 是提供在线支持和讨论的官方场所。
defaultDiscordText.english: Discord is the official place for online support and discussions.

defaultFacebookText.message: Facebook 讨论组 是和其他RF飞行员一起交流的好地方。
defaultFacebookText.english: Facebook Group is a good place for hanging out with other RF pilots.

defaultContributingText.message:
Rotorflight 是一个开源社区项目。任何人都可以加入并帮助它变得更好， 包括：
  • 帮助 Discord 或其他论坛中 Rotorflight 用户
  • 反馈 所遇到的Bug和问题，并提出改进建议
  • 测试新的软件版本、新功能和修复，并提供反馈
  • 参与新功能的讨论
  • 在 我们的网站上创建或更新内容
  • 参与开发 修复Bug，改进和添加新的功能
  • 翻译 Rotorflight配置器，或帮助维护现有的翻译
defaultContributingText.english:
Rotorflight is a open-source community project. Anybody can join in and help to make it better, including:
  • helping other users on Rotorflight Discord or other online forums
  • reporting bugs and issues, and suggesting improvements
  • testing new software versions, new features and fixes; and providing feedback
  • participating in discussions on new features
  • create or update content on our Website
  • contributing to the software development - fixing bugs, implementing new features and improvements
  • translating Rotorflight Configurator into a new language, or helping to maintain an existing translation

defaultDonateText.message:
Rotorflight 是开源固件 ，它是 免费提供并且没有保修，

如果你觉得 Rotorflight 有用，请考虑通过捐赠的方式支持我们的开发。
defaultDonateText.english:
Rotorflight is open source software and is available free of charge, without warranty.

If you find Rotorflight useful, please consider supporting the development by donating to the Rotorflight Project.

defaultDocumentation.message: Rotorflight文档可以在发行说明和网站中找到。
defaultDocumentation.english: Rotorflight documentation is available in release notes and website.

defaultDocumentation1.message: Rotorflight官网的教程是很棒的入门指南，你可以在这里找到。
defaultDocumentation1.english: The Rotorflight website tutorial is a great resource for information, it can be found here.

defaultDocumentation2.message: 官网的最新公告动态会发布在 这里。
defaultDocumentation2.english: The latest news can be read at the Website Announcements page, here.

defaultDocumentation3.message: 固件的发行说明可以在 GitHub 发布页面阅读，这里.
defaultDocumentation3.english: The release notes for the firmware can be read at GitHub releases page, here.

defaultSupport.message: 如需支持，请先搜索论坛和网站或与您的设备厂家联系。
defaultSupport.english: For support please search the forums and website first or contact your vendor.

configurationSerialPortsHelp.message: 为每个串行端口（UART）选择功能与波特率。

escProtocolDisabledMessage.message: 注意： 若选择不被您的电调所支持的电调协议将导致连接电池后电调会立刻驱动电机旋转。出于这个原因，在更改电调协议后，连接电池之前，请确保您的螺旋桨已被卸下！
escProtocolDisabledMessage.english: Caution: Selecting a motor output protocol that is not supported by your ESCs can lead to the ESCs spinning up as soon as a battery is connected. For this reason, always make sure to remove the props before connecting a battery for the first time after changing the motor output protocol.

configurationDshotBeaconHelp.message:
Dshot 信标使用电调和电机产生声音。这意味着当电机旋转时，Dshot 信标无法工作。若在 Dshot 信标激活时尝试解锁，飞控会在发出最后一声信标音后延迟2秒再解锁。这是为了防止 Dshot 信标功能干扰在解锁时发送的 Dshot 命令。
警告： 由于 Dshot 信标会有电流通过，如果信标鸣叫强度设置得太高，可能会造成电机/电调过热甚至损毁。建议使用 BLHeli 配置程序或 BLHeliSuite 来调整和测试信标的鸣叫强度。
configurationDshotBeaconHelp.english:
The Dshot beacon uses the ESCs and motors to produce sound. This means that the Dshot beacon cannot be used when the motors are spinning. If arming is attempted while the Dshot beacon is active, there is a 2 second delay after the last Dshot beacon tone before the craft is armed. This is to prevent the Dshot beacon functionality from interfering with the Dshot commands sent when arming.
Warning: Since the Dshot beacon is running current through your motors when active, this can result in excessive heat production and damage to your motors and / or ESCs if the beacon strength is set too high. Use BLHeli Configurator or the BLHeli Suite to adjust and test the beacon strength.

profilesProportionalHelp.message:
控制直升机跟随摇杆的力度(目标点)，并纠正外部影响。

更高的P值可以让飞机更快响应你的打杆，但如果与D值（微分）的比例过高，可能导致超调过冲。 可以将P值想象成汽车的弹簧。
profilesProportionalHelp.english:
Controls the strength of how tightly the machine tracks the sticks (the Setpoint) and corrects for external influences.

Higher value (gains) provide tighter tracking, but can cause overshoot if too high in proportion to the derivative (D-gain). Think of the P-term as the spring on a car.
profilesProportionalHelp.description: Proportional Term helpicon message on PID table titlebar

profilesIntegralHelp.message:
控制直升机能够持续保持跟随你的摇杆的强度。
类似于P值，但它更针对持续的力，如重心偏移或是强风影响。

较高的增益提供了对目标点更紧密的跟踪(即在不断的翻滚中)，可以使直升机紧密的跟随你的打杆，但过高的值可能在你停止打杆后滚转不会立刻停下。
如果与d项的比例非常高，可以引起振荡。
profilesIntegralHelp.english:
Controls the strength of how tightly the machine holds the overall rotation rate setpoint.
Similar to Proportional, but for longer biases on the craft from the rotation rate setpoint, as well as persistent outside influence, for example steady wind or CG offsets.

Higher gains provide tighter tracking of the setpoint (i.e. in constant flips and rolls), but can lead to the craft now being able to follow the setpoint on extremely quick inputs, which can lead to it continuing to rotate after the stick is released.
If extremely high in proportion to the D-term, can cause oscillations.
profilesIntegralHelp.description: Integral Term helpicon message on PID table titlebar

profilesDerivativeHelp.message:
控制直升机滚转的阻尼强度，无论是来自于打杆或者是外部的扰动。对于打杆，D值可以抑制运动以防止过度，缓解P值过高所带来的回弹。对于外部的扰动（如涡流或阵风），它可以有更强的抵抗能力。然而，D值对高频陀螺振动非常敏感(放大10倍到100倍)。

控制回路中的高频噪声可能导致舵机过热，如果陀螺仪噪声过滤不当(参见陀螺仪标签)，则会烧毁舵机。把D值想象成你车上的减震器，但它的固有负面特性是放大高频陀螺噪声。
profilesDerivativeHelp.english:
Controls the strength of damping ANY angular acceleration of the craft, whether from stick inputs or external influences. For stick inputs, the D-term damps the movement to prevent overshooting. For an outside influence (vorticity or wind gust) the D-term damps the disturbance.

Higher gains provide more damping and reduce possible overshoot from high P-terms.
However, the D-term is VERY sensitive to high frequency gyro vibrations (noise | magnifies by 10x to 100x).

High frequency noise in the control loop can cause excessive servo heat and burn out servos if the gyro noise is not filtered properly (see Gyro tab).

Think of the D-term as the shock absorber on your car, but with the inherent negative property of magnifying high frequency gyro noise.
profilesDerivativeHelp.description: Derivative Term helpicon message on PID table titlebar

profilesFeedforwardHelp.message:
前馈是基于打杆的额外补偿，使得P值对打杆输入有更强的响应，但前馈不会对直升机的运动做出任何反应

前馈基于命令设定值之间的差值(deg/sec)。更高的前馈将会使直升机对摇杆的响应更加敏锐
值过高可能导致超调，以及在打杆结束时姿态回缩
过低或0将导致对摇杆的响应缓慢和延迟，以及打杆结束后继续旋转。
profilesFeedforwardHelp.english:
This is an additional pushing term based on stick input. FF helps the P-term push the craft for commanded stick moves, does not react to any helicopter movements though.

The FF-term pushes based on the difference between the commanded Setpoint (deg/sec).

Higher values (gains) will result in a sharper response to stick input.
Too high of values may result in overshoot, as well as strikeback at the end of control inputs.
Too low or zero (0) values will result in a slow and delayed response to stick inputs, as well as continued rotation after the stick is released.
profilesFeedforwardHelp.description: Feedforward Term helpicon message on PID table titlebar

profilesBoostHelp.message: 这是基于目标点的微分对前馈的一个额外提升。Boost的增加可以使模型的反应更尖锐，没有高P值或前馈增益的缺点。
profilesBoostHelp.english: This is an additional boost on the feedforward, based on the derivative of the setpoint. An increase of Boost can make the model's reaction sharper, without he drawbacks of high Proportional or Feedforward gains.

receiverHelpZeroThrottle.message: 判断油门为 0% 时的油门通道值（单位µs）
receiverHelpZeroThrottle.english: The channel value (in µs) for the throttle channel to be considered 0%

receiverHelpFullThrottle.message: 判断油门为 100% 时的油门通道值（单位µs）
receiverHelpFullThrottle.english: The channel value (in µs) for the throttle channel to be considered 100%

receiverHelpCyclicDeadband.message: 这些值（单位µs）是 RC 输入在被视为非零之前的变化幅度。对于摇杆输出有漂移抖动的遥控器，可以增加这个值来消除部分抖动，这个对值对俯仰和横滚有效。
receiverHelpCyclicDeadband.english: These are values (in µs) by how much RC input can be different before it's considered non-zero. For transmitters with jitter on outputs, this value can be increased if RC inputs twitch while idle.

receiverHelpYawDeadband.message: 这些值（单位µs）是 RC 输入在被视为非零之前的变化幅度。对于摇杆输出有漂移抖动的遥控器，可以增加这个值来消除部分抖动，这个值仅对航向有效
receiverHelpYawDeadband.english: These are values (in µs) by how much RC input can be different before it's considered non-zero. For transmitters with jitter on outputs, this value can be increased if RC inputs twitch while idle. This setting is for Yaw only.

receiverTelemetryPinSwap.english: Telemetry Pin Swap (Swap Rx and Tx pins)

receiverHelpCrsfTelemetryMode.message: 启用ELRS的自定义遥测功能，它支持超多的遥测数据回传，你可以自由选择你需要的传感器。使用这个功能你需要在遥控器上启用RF的解码lua用于解析自定义的ELRS遥测。
receiverHelpCrsfTelemetryMode.english: Enables the Custom Rotorflight telemetry with ELRS. Requires a Lua script in the Tx for decoding the sensors. Custom telemetry provides a plethora of sensors for helicopter use.

receiverHelpCrsfTelemetryRate.message: 遥测用的ELRS刷新率，请将这个值设置与你高频头ELRS的刷新率一致
receiverHelpCrsfTelemetryRate.english: Radio link packet rate for telemetry. Set this to the same value as the ELRS packet rate in the Tx.

receiverHelpCrsfTelemetryRatio.message: ELRS遥测数据包的发射比率，即每多少次遥控信号发一次遥测，请将这个值设置与你高频头ELRS的比率一致
receiverHelpCrsfTelemetryRatio.english: Radio link packet ratio for telemetry. Set this to the same value as the ELRS telemetry ratio in the Tx.

receiverCrsfTelemetrySensor_BATTERY_CELL.message: Battery Cell Voltage（平均单片电压）
Battery Cell Voltages（电池每片电压）

receiverCrsfTelemetrySensor_CONTROL.message: Battery Cell Voltages（遥控器通道值（高精度））

receiverCrsfTelemetrySensor_ESC_CAPACITY.message: ESC Capacity（电调已消耗毫安数）

receiverCrsfTelemetrySensor_ESC_TEMP1.message: ESC Temp 1（电调1号温度传感器）

receiverCrsfTelemetrySensor_ESC_TEMP2.message: ESC Temp 2（电调2号温度传感器）

receiverCrsfTelemetrySensor_GPS_HOME_DIS.message: GPS Home Distance（GPS 起飞点距离）

receiverCrsfTelemetrySensor_GPS_HOME_DIR.message: GPS Home Direction（GPS 起飞点方向）

receiverCrsfTelemetrySensor_GPS_DATE_TIM.message: GPS Date Time（GPS 日期时间)

receiverCrsfTelemetrySensor_ARMING_DISAB.message: Arming Disable Flags（禁止解锁标志)

receiverBarsHelp.message: 精确显示接收机的原始遥控通道。请选择通道图，即每个遥控通道的相关功能。
receiverBarsHelp.english: Shows the raw RC channels from the receiver exactly the way they are received. Please select the channel map, i.e. the current function for each RC channel.

receiverHelpChannelOrder.message: 从下拉菜单中选择其中一个预设，或输入您自己的频道顺序。
receiverHelpChannelOrder.english: Select one of the presets from the dropdown menu, or enter your own channel order.

receiverButtonBindMessage.message: 对频请求已发送到飞行控制器。
receiverButtonBindMessage.english: Bind request sent to the flight controller.

receiverMspWarningText.message:
这些操纵杆允许在没有发射器或接收机的情况下解锁和测试直升机。但是，此功能不适用于飞行，并且不能装上桨叶。

此功能不能保证可靠地控制您的直升机。如果桨叶留在上面，可能会导致严重伤害。
receiverMspWarningText.english:
These sticks allow Rotorflight to be armed and tested without a transmitter or receiver being present. However, this feature is not intended for flight and rotor blades must not be attached.

This feature does not guarantee reliable control of your craft. Serious injury is likely to result if rotor blades are left on.

auxiliaryHelp.message:
在此处通过使用范围和/或链接到其他模式的组合配置飞行模式(BF4.0及更高版本支持链接) 。使用 范围 来定义遥控器上的开关和分配相应的模式。当接收机给出的通道值在最小/最大范围内将激活该模式。当一个模式被激活时，使用链接来激活另一个模式。例外: 解锁不能链接或者被链接到其他的模式，当一个模式已被链接则无法被再次链接(多重链接) 。多个范围/链接可以用于激活任何模式。如果为一个模式定义了多个范围/链接，则可以将每个范围/链接设置为和 或是 或。模式将在以下情况下被激活：
- 全部的和 范围/链接都激活; 或者是
- 至少有一个 或 范围/链接激活。

记得使用保存按钮来保存你的设置。
auxiliaryHelp.english:
Configure modes here using a combination of ranges and/or links to other modes (links supported on BF 4.0 and later). Use ranges to define the switches on your transmitter and corresponding mode assignments. A receiver channel that gives a reading between a range min/max will activate the mode. Use a link to activate a mode when another mode is activated. Exceptions: ARM cannot be linked to or from another mode, modes cannot be linked to other modes that are configured with a link (chained links). Multiple ranges/links can be used to activate any mode. If there is more than one range/link defined for a mode, each of them can be set to AND or OR. A mode will be activated when:
- ALL AND ranges/links are active; OR
- at least one OR range/link is active.

Remember to save your settings using the Save button.

auxiliaryDisabled.description: Text to add to the ARM mode (maybe others in the future) in the MODES TAB when it has been disabled for some external reason

adjustmentsHelp.message: 配置调整开关。详细信息请参阅手册中的“飞行中调整”章节。通过该调整功能所进行的更改将不会被自动保存。
adjustmentsHelp.english: Configure adjustment switches. See the 'in-flight adjustments' section of the manual for details. The changes that adjustment functions make are not saved automatically.

adjustmentSlotsHelp.message: 共有4个滑槽。同时进行调整时每个开关都需要配置专用滑槽。
adjustmentSlotsHelp.english: There are 4 slots. Each switch used to concurrently make adjustments requires exclusive use of a slot.

adjustmentsExample1.message: 使用AUX1通道上的三段开关在Pitch/Roll的 P, I 和 D 之间选择，使用AUX2通道的三段开关来上下增大和减小数值（拨高，或拨低）。
adjustmentsExample1.english: Use a three position switch on AUX1 to select between Pitch/Roll P, I and D and another three position switch on AUX2 to increase or decrease the value when held up or down.

adjustmentsExample2.message: 使用 AUX4 通道上的三段开关来选择 Rate 配置文件
adjustmentsExample2.english: Use a three position switch on AUX4 to select enable Rate Profile Selection via the same three position switch on the same channel.

adjustmentsFunctionYawCollectiveDyn.message: 航向集体螺距瞬时前馈增益

adjustmentsFunctionYawCollectiveDecay.message: 航向集体螺距瞬时前馈增益衰减

adjustmentsFunctionGovernorCyclicFF.message: 定速器循环螺距预补偿

adjustmentsFunctionGovernorCollectiveFF.message: 定速器集体螺距预补偿

servoHelp.message:
舵机101
  • 首先检查舵机方向。例如，通过给予一些集体螺距来检查循环舵机系统。反向舵机，如果需要。
  • 通过启动舵机调试和调节中心点来调平舵机臂。舵机臂在此位置应垂直于主轴。
  • 调整缩放使舵机角度正确。指定角度为30°;在舵机调试下的舵机。舵机现在应该移动到30度。如果小于，则增加该舵机的缩放。如果更多，就减少。
  • 您可以通过调整最小值或最大值来限制或扩展舵机运动范围。只有在出现机械问题时才这样做，比如舵机干涉。使用混控限制横滚/俯仰/集体螺距
servoHelp.english:
Servo 101
  • First check the servo directions. Check cyclic servos by giving some collective, for example. Reverse servos if needed.
  • Level the servo arms by enabling Servo Override and adjusting Center. The servo arm should be perpendicular to the main shaft in this position.
  • Adjust Scale so that servo angles are correct. Specify an angle of 30° for a servo under Servo Override. The servo should now move to 30°. If it's less, increase the Scale for that servo. If it's more, decrease it.
  • You can limit or extend the servo movement range by adjusting Min or Max. Do this only if there's a mechanical issue, like servo binding. Use the mixer to limit roll/pitch/collective.

servoMidHelp.message: 中心点的信号，在这个信号下，舵机臂应该是水平的
servoMidHelp.english: Center position in µs. The servo arm should be level in this position.

servoMinHelp.message: 舵机摆动的最低点(最小脉冲宽度)。这个参数会限制舵机允许摆动的范围。用于避免舵机臂在移动到最小值的干涉碰撞。
servoMinHelp.english: Lowest point of travel (minimum pulse width). This setting changes the allowed negative servo throw. It is used for avoiding servo arm binding at the negative travel extreme.

servoMaxHelp.message: 舵机摆动的最高点(最大脉冲宽度)。这个参数会限制舵机允许摆动的范围。用于避免舵机臂在移动到最小值的干涉碰撞。
servoMaxHelp.english: Highest point of travel (maximum pulse width). This setting changes the allowed positive servo throw. It is used for avoiding servo arm binding at the positive travel extreme.

servoScaleNegHelp.message: 负方向的缩放系数。 对于宽频（1520µs）舵机，通常为 500µs；对于窄频（760µs）舵机，通常为 250µs。修改这个值可以用于纠正舵机在正负方向的非线性。
servoScaleNegHelp.english: Scaling factor on the negative side. Typically 500µs for normal (1520µs) servos, and 250µs for narrow band (760µs) servos. Altering this setting from the default is used for correcting any nonlinearity between the negative and positive throws.

servoScalePosHelp.message: 负方向的缩放系数。 对于宽频（1520µs）舵机，通常为 500µs；对于窄频（760µs）舵机，通常为 250µs。修改这个值可以用于纠正舵机在正负方向的非线性。
servoScalePosHelp.english: Scaling factor on the positive side. Typically 500µs for normal (1520µs) servos, and 250µs for narrow band (760µs) servos. Altering this setting from the default is used for correcting any nonlinearity between the negative and positive throws.

servoRateHelp.message:
PWM更新频率(Hz)。对于模拟舵机，将其设置为50Hz，太高的值可能会损坏舵机。对于数字舵机，数值从100Hz到560Hz是比较常见的。请检查舵机的参数。
说明:选择保存并重启后，舵机频率的更改才会生效。
servoRateHelp.english:
PWM update rate in Hz. For analog servos, set it to 50Hz, as higher values can cause damage. For digital servos, values from 100Hz to 560Hz are typical. Please check the servo data sheet.
Note: Select Save and reboot to actually change the update rate, as the rate is initialised at boot time.

servoSpeedHelp.message: 限制舵机的旋转速度。可用于回缩等情况。数值为 0 表示没有限制。1-60000 毫秒之间的数值表示 60° 旋转所需的时间。
servoSpeedHelp.english: Limits the servo motion speed. Can be used for e.g. retracts. A value of 0 means no limitation. Values between 1-60000 milliseconds specify the time needed for 60° rotation.

servoReverseHelp.message: 反转舵机的旋转方向，如果它没有按照预期的方向旋转
servoReverseHelp.english: Reverse the servo if it's not moving in the right direction.

servoGeometryCorrectionHelp.message: 启用 几何校正用于校正舵机臂在旋转到高角度时的几何误差。请勿与线性伺服器一起使用。
servoGeometryCorrectionHelp.english: Enable Geometry Correction for correcting the rotational geometry at the servo movement extremes. Do not use with linear servos.

servoRateRebootNote.message: 警告： 对舵机速率参数的更改需要重启系统后才能生效！
servoRateRebootNote.english: Warning: Changes to the Servo Rate parameter require System Reboot before taking affect!

servoUnusualLimitsWarning.message: 舵机的 限制 设置为异常值。请检查！
servoUnusualLimitsWarning.english: Warning: The servo Limits are set to unusual values. Please check!

servoUnusualScalesWarning.message: 警告： 舵机的 缩放 设置为异常值。请检查！
servoUnusualScalesWarning.english: Warning: The servo Scales are set to unusual values. Please check!

servoUnusualRatesWarning.message: 警告： 舵机的 频率 设置为异常值。请检查！
servoUnusualRatesWarning.english: Warning: The servo Rates are set to unusual values. Please check!

servoUnusualGeometryCorrection.message: 警告： 舵机的 几何校正 设置为异常值。请检查！
servoUnusualGeometryCorrection.english: Warning: The Geometry correction is not equal for all servos. Please check!

servoOverrideHelp.message: 选择要调试的舵机，移动滑块，舵机将会旋转到指定的角度。
servoOverrideHelp.english: Select the servo to be controlled and then move the slider to move the servo arm to the commanded angle.

servoEnableOverrideText.message: 舵机调试 出于调试的目的，将舵机旋转到指定角度。 这个指令不会被保存，重启后将会重置。
servoEnableOverrideText.english: Servo override forces the servos to a arbitrary positions for setup purposes. The override values are not saved, and will be reset after a reboot.

mixerCustomNote.message: 警告： 混控被配置为自定义配置 ，不能在配置器界面中显示。任何配置更改都必须在命令行中使用mixer命令完成。
mixerCustomNote.english: Warning: The Mixer is configured with a custom setup that can't be presented in the GUI. Any configuration changes must be done in the CLI, with the mixer command.

mixerRulesNote.message: 警告： 混控使用自定义配置进行设置，任何规则更改都需要在命令行中使用mixer rule进行配置
mixerRulesNote.english: Warning: The Mixer is configured with custom rules. Any rule changes must be done in the CLI, with the mixer rule command.

mixerBidirNote.message: 警告： 双向尾电机 是一项试验性功能，需要在命令行中进行额外配置。
mixerBidirNote.english: Warning: Bidirectional tail motor is an experimental feature that requires additional settings in the CLI.

mixerRebootNote.message: 警告： 某些设置需要重启后才会生效！
mixerRebootNote.english: Warning: Some settings require System Reboot to take affect!

mixerMainRotorDirectionHelp.message: 从直升机的顶部往下看，主旋翼以什么方向旋转？对于大多数直升机，它是顺时针旋转的
mixerMainRotorDirectionHelp.english: Looking from the top of the helicopter, what direction is the main rotor turning? For the majority of helicopters this is clockwise.

mixerSwashTypeHelp.message:
无： 混控将会关闭，需要在命令行中进行配置。

直通： 不进行混控，控制功能原封不动地通过混控器进行外部混合。

CCPM: 循环-集体 螺距混控。用于具有三个斜盘舵机的循环螺距直升机（120°，135°或140°）。

FPM: 固定螺距混控。用于固定螺距直升机与两个90度摆放的斜盘舵机，可以是L型或是V型。
mixerSwashTypeHelp.english:
None: The mixer is disabled. Custom mixing rules must be set in the CLI.

Direct: No mixing, controls are passed through the mixer unchanged for external mixing.

CCPM: Cyclic-Collective Pitch Mixing. For cyclic-pitch helicopters with three swashplate servos, at 120°, 135°, or 140° angle.

FPM: Fixed Pitch Mixing. For fixed-pitch helicopters with two swashplate servos at 90° angle, either in L or V configuration.

mixerElevatorDirectionHelp.message: 根据升降舵机的位置和旋翼头的设计，方向可能会相反。
mixerElevatorDirectionHelp.english: Depending on the elevator servo position and the head design, the direction may be reversed.

mixerAileronDirectionHelp.message: 根据副翼舵机的位置和旋翼头的设计，方向可能会相反。
mixerAileronDirectionHelp.english: Depending on the aileron servo position and the head design, the direction may be reversed.

mixerCollectiveDirectionHelp.message: 取决于主桨夹控制臂的位置，集体螺距方向可以逆转。通常后缘控制是反向的。
mixerCollectiveDirectionHelp.english: Depending on the blade grip control arm position, the collective direction may be reversed. Usually trailing edge control has reversed direction.

mixerCyclicCalibrationHelp.message: 调整循环螺距增益，使其与旋翼头设计中的机械增益相匹配。
mixerCyclicCalibrationHelp.english: Adjust the cyclic gain to match the mechanical gain in the head design.

mixerCollectiveCalibrationHelp.message: 调整集体螺距增益，使其与旋翼头设计中的机械增益相匹配。
mixerCollectiveCalibrationHelp.english: Adjust the collective gain to match the mechanical gain in the head design.

mixerCollectiveGeoCorrectionHelp.message: 调整该值直到集体螺距正负一致
mixerCollectiveGeoCorrectionHelp.english: Adjust until the collective positive and negative deflections are equal.

mixerTotalPitchLimitHelp.message: 集体螺距+循环螺距的最大极限
mixerTotalPitchLimitHelp.english: Maximum amount of total cyclic + collective blade pitch.

mixerCyclicLimitHelp.message: 倾斜盘的最大循环螺距极限。
mixerCyclicLimitHelp.english: Maximum amount of cyclic blade pitch.

mixerCollectiveLimitHelp.message: 倾斜盘的最大集体螺距极限。。
mixerCollectiveLimitHelp.english: Maximum amount of collective blade pitch.

mixerSwashRingHelp.message: 当俯仰角和横滚角均为最大值时，增加斜盘限制值将限制倾斜盘的最大角度。
mixerSwashRingHelp.english:
The swashring limits the maximum angle the swashplate can reach in order to prevent binding. Pitch and Roll axis should be configured individually (via the Mixer input and scaling) to the desired pitch angles (without binding). If however, both the maximum Pitch and Roll are commanded at the same time, the Swashplate will have to deflect to a larger angle than either axis individually. This may result in the swashplate binding on the main shaft.

Increasing the value of Swashring will limit the maximum Swashplate angle when both Pitch and Roll are maximum.

mixerSwashPhaseHelp.message: 倾斜盘控制的相位偏移。
mixerSwashPhaseHelp.english: The phase offset for the swashplate controls.

mixerSwashTrimHelp.message: 微调斜盘舵机连杆的功能，仅在连杆物理长度不可调时使用
mixerSwashTrimHelp.english: Trim for swashplate linkages. Use only if the linkages are not adjustable.

mixerTailRotorModeHelp.message:
变距尾翼： 由一个舵机驱动的可变螺距尾旋翼(4号舵机).
电机直驱： 由电机（2号电机）直接驱动尾旋翼控制航向
双向电机直驱： 与电机直驱一样，但允许电机改变旋转方向（实验性）
mixerTailRotorModeHelp.english:
Variable pitch: Variable pitch tail controlled by a tail servo (Servo#4).
Motorised: The tail has a separate motor (Motor#2) for controlling the yaw.
Bi-directional: Motorised tail operating in bi-directional mode (experimental).

mixerTailRotorDirectionHelp.message: 取决于尾旋翼方向和电调 / 舵机配置，航向方向是可调的。
mixerTailRotorDirectionHelp.english: Depending on the tail rotor direction and ESC/servo configuration, the yaw direction may be reversed.

mixerTailRotorCalibrationHelp.message: 调整航向增益以匹配机械增益。舵机驱动尾旋翼的比例通常在50-150%左右，但电机直驱尾旋翼的比例可能大不相同。
mixerTailRotorCalibrationHelp.english: Adjust the yaw gain to match the mechanical gain. Usually around 50-150% for servo driven tails, but can be wildly different for motorised tail rotors.

mixerTailRotorMinYawHelp.message: 顺时针航向的角度极限
mixerTailRotorMinYawHelp.english: An angle limit for clockwise yaw.

mixerTailRotorMaxYawHelp.message: 逆时针航向的角度极限
mixerTailRotorMaxYawHelp.english: An angle limit for counter-clockwise yaw.

mixerTailMotorMinYawHelp.message: 针对顺时针旋转的航向轴限制

mixerTailMotorMaxYawHelp.message: 针对逆时针旋转的航向轴限制

mixerTailMotorIdleHelp.message: 这是发送到尾电机的最小油门信号。这应该设置得足够高，电机才不会停止
mixerTailMotorIdleHelp.english: This is the minimum throttle signal sent to the tail motor. This should be set just high enough that the motor does not stop

mixerTailRotorCenterTrimHelp.message: 设置尾旋翼的0度螺距，使其在混控调试0度时，尾旋翼能够完全水平
mixerTailRotorCenterTrimHelp.english: Set tail rotor trim to achieve zero blade pitch with 0° yaw mixer override.

mixerTailMotorCenterTrimHelp.message: 微调0度航向指令时的尾电机油门值。
mixerTailMotorCenterTrimHelp.english: Set tail motor throttle value for zero yaw command.

mixerInputChannelsHelp.message:
注意！这里是限制控制的正确位置

混合器输入率用于设置缩放比例，以匹配机械设置。由于每个旋翼头都不同，因此每个设置需要不同的缩放值。
控制 这一栏包含每个稳定控制功能。
最小值：设置指令下达时希望桨叶达到的最小角度。
最大值：设置指令下达时希望桨叶达到的最大角度。
缩放比例：增大或减小缩放值，直到直升机桨叶与指令角度一致。

混控输入校准流程
步骤1： 打开该页面上的混控调试功能开关。
步骤2： 在要校准的通道左侧打开开关。
步骤3： 将混音器覆盖设置为一个角度（例如 10 度）。
步骤4： 测量桨叶的实际角度。
步骤5： 设置缩放比例，使实际桨叶角度与指令角度一致。
mixerInputChannelsHelp.english:
Note! This is the right place to limit your controls

The mixer input rate is for setting the scaling factors to match the mechanical head setup. As every rotor head is different, different scaling values are needed for each setup.
Control: This column contains each of the Stabilized control functions.
Minimum: Set the minimum angle you wish the blade to reach when commanded.
Maximum: Set the maximum angle you wish the blade to reach when commanded.
Scaling: Increase or decrease the scaling value until the helicopter blades match the commanded angle.

Mixer Input Calibration Process
Step 1: Enable the mixer override by the selector on the 'SYSTEM' tab. The Mixer Override entry will now be visible on this page.
Step 2: Enable the bypass on the Control to be calibrated.
Step 3: Set the Mixer override to an angle (say 10 degrees).
Step 4: Measure the actual blade angle.
Step 5: Set the scaling so the physical blade angle matches the commanded angle.

mixerOverrideNote.message: 注意 混控调试功能可将混控输入强制设置到任意位置，以便进行调试校准。调试值不会保存，会在重启时重置。
mixerOverrideNote.english: Note. Mixer Override forces the mixer inputs to arbitrary positions for setup purposes. The override values are not saved, and will be reset in reboot.

mixerOverrideHelp.message: 该功能用于设置旋翼，是混控校准过程的一部分。当启用激活时，可直接将混控指令发送到所要求的位置。
mixerOverrideHelp.english: This feature is used for setting up the rotor and is part of the Mixer Calibration process. When the bypass enable is active the mixer can be commanded to the requested positions directly.

mixerOverrideEnableSwitchText.message: 混控调试功能可将混控输入强制设置到任意位置，以便进行校准。调试值不会保存，会在重启时重置。
mixerOverrideEnableSwitchText.english: Mixer Override forces the mixer inputs to arbitrary positions for setup purposes. The override values are not saved, and will be reset in reboot.

dialogMixerResetNote.message: 选择预设的斜盘类型会将任何自定义混控规则重置为默认值。
dialogMixerResetNote.english: Selecting a pre-defined Swashplate type will reset any custom Mixer rules to defaults.

motorsEscProtocolHelp.message:
选择您的电调协议
传统的直升机电调使用PWM，无人机电调可能使用其他协议，如Dshot
确保你的电调支持该协议
motorsEscProtocolHelp.english:
Select your ESC protocol.
Traditional helicopter ESCs use PWM. Drone ESCs may use other protocols, like DSHOT.
Make sure the protocol is supported by your ESC.

motorsEscProtocolDisabled.message: 请选择合适您的电调的输出协议。 $t(escProtocolDisabledMessage.message)
motorsEscProtocolDisabled.english: Please select a protocol appropriate for your ESCs. $t(escProtocolDisabledMessage.message)

motorsEscTelemetryProtocolHelp.message: 选择你的电调遥测协议，在此之前请确认你已经正确接线，并在 配置 页面将对应的串口设置为了“电调遥测”.
motorsEscTelemetryProtocolHelp.english: Your ESC Telemetry protocol. Connect the telemetry wire from the ESC to your FC. Specify which UART to use for ESC Telemetry in the Configuration tab.

motorsEscTelemetryHalfDuplexHelp.message: 仅使用一个TX引脚进行双向通信功能，如果你要使用比如好盈铂金，天蝎星等电调的遥控器调参功能，则必须启用该功能。
motorsEscTelemetryHalfDuplexHelp.english: Use the Tx pin for both sending and receiving. Required for forward programming of supported ESCs (e.g. Hobbywing Platinum V5 or Scorpion Tribunus).

motorsEscTelemetryPinswapHelp.message: 对调RX/TX引脚，注意：此选项在 F4 主控上不受支持，详见帮助文档。
motorsEscTelemetryPinswapHelp.english: Swaps the Rx and Tx pins. Note: this option is NOT supported on F4 MCUs, see help.

motorsUnsyncedPwmHelp.message: 电调 PWM 未同步运行，与 PID 循环分开，以指定频率运行。
motorsUnsyncedPwmHelp.english: ESC PWM is running unsyncronised, separate from the PID loop, at the specified frequency.

motorsUnsyncedPWMFreqHelp.message: ESC PWM更新频率，单位为Hz。这就是油门值发送到电调的频率。通常在50Hz到250Hz之间。大多数现代电调在250Hz时工作良好。
motorsUnsyncedPWMFreqHelp.english: ESC PWM update frequency in Hz. This is how often the throttle value is sent to the ESC. Usually between 50Hz and 250Hz. Most modern ESCs work fine with 250Hz.

motorsDshotBidirHelp.message:
通过DShot将转速发送回飞控
注：需要兼容的电调和固件，例如BLHeli32（32.7以上版本）, Bluejay（蓝鸟） 或是 AM32.
motorsDshotBidirHelp.english:
The ESC RPM is sent back to the FC with Dshot. Also known as bidirectional Dshot.
Note: Requires a compatible ESC, like AM32, Bluejay or BLHeli32 version 32.7 or higher.

motorsRPMSensorHelp.message: 使用转速传感器输入电机转速，你可以通过连接电调或者外部传感器获得
motorsRPMSensorHelp.english: Use the RPM Sensor input for motor RPM. You can connect an RPM signal from the ESC, or from an external RPM Sensor dongle.

motorsMainRotorGearRatioHelp.message:
电机与主旋翼的传动比
使用 电机齿 : 主齿 牙数
motorsMainRotorGearRatioHelp.english:
Gear ratio between the motor and the main rotor.
Use motor pinion : main gear tooth count.

motorsTailRotorGearRatioHelp.message: 尾旋翼与主旋翼的传动比，使用 后尾齿 : 前尾齿 牙数, 或是后皮带轮 : 前皮带轮， 对于电机直驱尾旋翼，请使用 1 : 1
motorsTailRotorGearRatioHelp.english: Gear ratio between the tail rotor and the main rotor. Use tail gear : autorotation gear tooth count for Torque Tube, or tail pulley : front pulley for a belt tail. For a direct drive tail, use 1 : 1

motorsMotorPolesHelp.message: 磁铁极数 电机转子上面的磁铁数量，一般可以在说明书上找到，或者你可以手动数一下磁铁数量，注意不是铜线绕组的定子。
motorsMotorPolesHelp.english: The pole count is the number of magnets on the motor bell. The manual should give this number. Or you can count the magnets. Do NOT count the stators with the copper wire windings.

motorsThrottleMinimumHelp.message: 该 PWM 值将在最低油门（对应油机的空转油门）时发送至电调/油门舵机。
motorsThrottleMinimumHelp.english: This PWM value is sent to the ESC/servo at low throttle (idle throttle with ICE).

motorsThrottleMaximumHelp.message: 该 PWM 值将在全油门时发送至电调/油门舵机。
motorsThrottleMaximumHelp.english: This PWM value is sent to the ESC/servo at full throttle.

motorsThrottleMinimumCommandHelp.message: 电机彻底停转的油门值，油门通道的信号需要小于该值，才允许解锁直升机
motorsThrottleMinimumCommandHelp.english: This PWM value is sent to the ESC/servo when the motor is stopped. This is also a value that allows the ESC to arm.

motorMainGearRatioIssueNote.message: 警告： 主旋翼齿比 设置为不正确的值。请检查!
motorMainGearRatioIssueNote.english: Warning: Main Rotor Gear Ratio is set to an incorrect value. Please check!

motorTailGearRatioIssueNote.message: 警告： 尾旋翼齿比设置为不正确的值。请检查!
motorTailGearRatioIssueNote.english: Warning: Tail Rotor Gear Ratio is set to an incorrect value. Please check!

motorOverrideNote.message:
注释 油门调试：出于设置和测试目的，将输出油门强制设置为任意值。覆盖值不会保存，会在重启时重置。

电机油门调试将使电机启动！
motorOverrideNote.english:
Note. Throttle Override forces the output throttle to an arbitrary value for setup and testing purposes. The override values are not saved, and will be reset in reboot.

MOTOR THROTTLE OVERRIDE WILL MAKE THE MOTORS TO SPOOL UP!

govConfigurationNote.message: 注意：定速器具有全局参数与飞行配置参数。请参阅飞行参数选项卡的飞行参数具体参数。
govConfigurationNote.english: Note: Governor has both global and profile parameters. Please see the Profiles tab for profile specific parameters.

govModeHelp.message:
关闭： 定速器禁用，油门信号将直接从遥控器传送到电调。

直通：定速器不控制转速，但提供缓启动和熄火重启的功能。

标准： 转速由飞控定速器控制，类似于一个普通的电调定速功能。

模式1： 与标准类似，但提供集体螺距与循环螺距的补偿（类似于遥控器中的油门曲线）

模式2： 类似于模式1，但具有对电压骤降的补偿，该模式需要有足够快的电压回传才能使用。
govModeHelp.english:
OFF: Governor is disabled and the throttle from the Tx is passed through to the ESC.

PASSTHROUGH: Throttle passthrough from the Tx, with slow spoolup and autorotation control.

STANDARD: Motor speed is controlled by the FC. Equivalent to a typical ESC Governor.

MODE1: Like STANDARD but with Collective and Cyclic Precompensation (i.e. collective changes are proactively changing the throttle, just like a throttle curve in the Tx).

MODE2: Like MODE1, but with proactive battery voltage sag compensation. Requires fast voltage measurement.

govHandoverThrottleHelp.message: 定速器接管油门的油门值，低于这个油门的会直接传送到电调，超过此油门定速器才会介入，并通过油门值计算需要达到的目标转速。请确保电机在此值以下能够顺利启动。
govHandoverThrottleHelp.english: The throttle level above which the governor is activated. Below this level the input throttle is passed to the ESC - above this level the governor is enabled and the input throttle is used for calculating the target headspeed. The motor must be able to start below this throttle level.

govStartupTimeHelp.message: 未检测到有效转速时的缓启动的时间常数，以秒为单位，测量主旋翼从零到全速的时间。
govStartupTimeHelp.english: Time constant for slow startup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

govSpoolupTimeHelp.message: 检测到有效转速时的缓启动的时间常数，以秒为单位，测量主旋翼从零到全速的时间。
govSpoolupTimeHelp.english: Time constant for slow spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

govTrackingTimeHelp.message: 主旋翼速度变化的时间常数，以秒为单位，测量从零到全速前进的时间。
govTrackingTimeHelp.english: Time constant for headspeed changes, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

govRecoveryTimeHelp.message: 恢复二阶启动的时间常数，以秒为单位，测量从零到全速的时间。
govRecoveryTimeHelp.english: Time constant for recovery spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

govAutoBailoutTimeHelp.message: 熄火重启保护的时间常数（秒），测量主旋翼从零到全速的时间。
govAutoBailoutTimeHelp.english: Time constant for autorotation bailout spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

govAutoTimeoutHelp.message: 结束熄火降落并进入正常IDLE状态的超时时间。
govAutoTimeoutHelp.english: Timeout for ending autorotation and moving to normal IDLE.

govAutoMinEntryTime.message: 熄火降落最小进入时间 [秒]

govAutoMinEntryTimeHelp.message: 启动熄火降落前的最短飞行时间。
govAutoMinEntryTimeHelp.english: Minimum flight time before autorotation can be engaged.

govZeroThrottleTimeoutHelp.message: 在关闭定速器之前，丢失(零)油门信号的超时时间。如果在此时间内恢复油门信号，定速器将执行恢复 Spoolup 启动。
govZeroThrottleTimeoutHelp.english: Timeout for missing (zero) throttle signal, before shutting down the governor. If the throttle signal returns within this timeout, the governor will perform a recovery spoolup.

govLostHeadspeedTimeout.message: 主旋翼转速信号超时 [秒]

govLostHeadspeedTimeoutHelp.message: 丢失主旋翼转速信号超过此时间，才会降速。如果在此时间内恢复转速信号，定速器将执行恢复 Spoolup 启动。
govLostHeadspeedTimeoutHelp.english: Timeout for missing headspeed signal, before spooling down. If the RPM signal returns within this timeout, the governor will perform a recovery spoolup.

govHeadspeedFilterHz.message: 主旋翼转速滤波器截止点 [Hz]

govHeadspeedFilterHzHelp.message: 主旋翼转速低通滤波器的截止点
govHeadspeedFilterHzHelp.english: Cutoff for the headspeed lowpass filter.

govVoltageFilterHz.message: 电池电压滤波器截止点 [Hz]

govVoltageFilterHzHelp.message: 电池电压低通滤波器的截止点。
govVoltageFilterHzHelp.english: Cutoff for the battery voltage lowpass filter.

govTTAFilterHzHelp.message: TTA 低通滤波器的截止点。
govTTAFilterHzHelp.english: Cutoff for the TTA lowpass filter.

govFFFilterHzHelp.message: 循环/集体预补偿低通滤波器的截止频率。
govFFFilterHzHelp.english: Cutoff for the cyclic/collective precompensation lowpass filter.

govHeadspeedHelp.message: 定速器的目标转速是通过最高转速与油门输入量相乘计算得出的
govHeadspeedHelp.english: The governor target headspeed is calculated by multiplying the full headspeed with the throttle input.

govHeadspeedNote.message: 警告：改变主旋翼转速将影响 PID 调整。如果您已经调整了 PID 控制器增益，则可能需要重复调整。
govHeadspeedNote.english: Warning: Changing the headspeed will affect the PID tuning. If you have already tuned the PID Controller Gains, it is likely you will need to repeat the tuning.

govMaxThrottleHelp.message: 定速器允许输出的最大油门量
govMaxThrottleHelp.english: Maximum output throttle the governor is allowed to use.

govMasterGainHelp.message: 主 PID 循环的增益，通常是10..100

govPGainHelp.message: PID 循环中的 P 增益，通常是10..100

govIGainHelp.message: PID 循环中的 I 增益，通常是10..100

govDGainHelp.message: PID 循环中的 D 增益，通常是10..100

govFGainHelp.message: 集体螺距/循环螺距的前馈增益，通常是10..100

govTTAGainHelp.message: 尾旋翼扭矩辅助强度（增益）。这是一个增益，用于增加主旋翼转速，以增加逆时针自旋的尾巴力度（例如，电机直驱尾旋翼低于空转速度）。通常为 50...150
govTTAGainHelp.english: Tail Torque Assist strength (gain). This is a gain applied to increase the headspeed to control the tail in the negative direction (e.g. Motorised tail less than idle speed). Usually 50..150

govTTALimit.message: 尾旋翼扭矩辅助（TTA） 增益上限[%]

govTTALimitHelp.message: 尾部扭矩辅助最大主旋翼转速增幅。允许主旋翼转速增加的上限。通常为 20%...50%。
govTTALimitHelp.english: Tail Torque Assist maximum Headspeed increase. This sets an upper limit how much the headspeed can go over the Full Headspeed. Usually 20..50%.

govYawPrecompHelp.message: 偏航预补偿权重。确定前馈中混合的尾舵量。这有助于调速器主动保持头速。通常 20..100
govYawPrecompHelp.english: Yaw precompensation weight. Determines how much Yaw is mixed into the feedforward. This helps the governor to maintain the headspeed proactively. Usually 20..100

govCyclicPrecompHelp.message: 循环螺距预补偿权重。决定前馈中混控多少循环螺距。这有助于定速器主动保持主旋翼速度。通常为 20...100
govCyclicPrecompHelp.english: Cyclic precompensation weight. Determines how much cyclic is mixed into the feedforward. This helps the governor to maintain the headspeed proactively. Usually 20..100

govCollectivePrecompHelp.message: 集体螺距预补偿权重。决定前馈中混控多少集体螺距。这有助于定速器主动保持主旋翼速度。通常为 20...100
govCollectivePrecompHelp.english: Collective precompensation weight. Determines how much collective is mixed into the feedfoward. This helps the governor to maintain the headspeed proactively. Usually 20..100

sensorsInfo.message:
请注意，设置过高的图形刷新率会缩短尤其是笔记本电脑的电池使用时间。
建议只打开你感兴趣的传感器的图形显示并使用合理的刷新率
sensorsInfo.english:
Keep in mind that using fast update periods and rendering multiple graphs at the same time is resource heavy and will burn your battery quicker if you use a laptop.
We recommend to only render graphs for sensors you are interested in while using reasonable update periods.

sensorsAltitudeHint.message: 高度的计算方法是将气压计(如果可用) 的输出与 GPS(如果可用) 的高度输出结合起来。如果已连接到一个 GPS 模块且 GPS 模块定位成功后，则将在未解锁时显示相对于海平面的绝对高度。解锁后，显示相对于解锁时的相对高度。
sensorsAltitudeHint.english: The altitude is calculated by combining the output of the barometer (if available) with the altitude output from the GPS (if available). If a GPS connected and the GPS has a fix, the absolute altitude above sea level will be shown when disarmed. When armed, the altitude relative to the position when arming will be shown.

cliInfo.message:
注意：退出 CLI 页面或者点击断开连接将自动向飞控发送“退出”指令。在最新的固件中这将使飞控重启并且未保存的设置将会丢失。

警告：CLI中的某些命令可能导致电机输出引脚发出随机指令。如果连接电池，这有可能导致电机旋转。因此，强烈建议在 CLI 中输入命令之前确保未连接电池。
cliInfo.english:
Note: Leaving CLI tab or pressing Disconnect will automatically send "exit" to the board. With the latest firmware this will make the controller restart and unsaved changes will be lost.

Warning: Some commands in CLI can result in arbitrary signals being sent on the motor output pins. This can cause motors to spin up if a battery is connected. Therefore it is highly recommended to make sure that no battery is connected before entering commands in CLI.

cliInputPlaceholderBuilding.message: 正在构建“自动填充”缓存，请稍候…
cliInputPlaceholderBuilding.english: Please wait while building AutoComplete cache ...

cliConfirmSnippetDialogTitle.message: 已加载文件{{fileName}}。查看已加载的命令
cliConfirmSnippetDialogTitle.english: Loaded file {{fileName}}. Review the loaded commands

cliConfirmSnippetNote.message: 注意: 您可以在执行前查看和编辑命令。
cliConfirmSnippetNote.english: Note: You can review and edit commands before execution.

dialogCLIExitNote.message:
输入 save 将保存并退出命令行（CLI）

输入 exit 将放弃更改并退出命令行（CLI)
dialogCLIExitNote.english:
Type save to save changes and exit CLI.

Type exit to discard changes and exit CLI.

loggingNote.message:
数据仅会在此页面记录，关闭此页面将会 取消数据记录，并且应用将会返回“普通配置” 状态。
你可以选择合适的全局刷新率，飞控出于性能考虑，只会每 1 秒写入一次日志。
loggingNote.english:
Data will be logged in this tab only, leaving the tab will cancel logging and application will return to its normal "configurator" state.
You are free to select the global update period, data will be written into the log file every 1 second for performance reasons.

loggingErrorOneProperty.message: 至少需要选择一个数据集来记录
loggingErrorOneProperty.english: Please select at least one property to log

loggingAutomaticallyRetained.message: 已自动加载上一个记录文件: $1

blackboxNotSupported.message: 该飞控固件不支持黑盒日志记录
blackboxNotSupported.english: Your flight controller's firmware does not support Blackbox logging.

blackboxMaybeSupported.message: 飞控固件版本太低，无法打开该页面，或者黑盒功能没有在设置页面打开。
blackboxMaybeSupported.english: Your flight controller's firmware is too old to support this tab, or the Blackbox feature is disabled on the Configuration tab.

serialLoggingSupportedNote.message: 你可以使用串口外接记录设备来记录日志（例如 OpenLager）。需要在串口设置页设置相应的串口。
serialLoggingSupportedNote.english: You can log to an external logging device (such as an OpenLager) by using a serial port. Configure the port on the Ports tab.

sdcardNote.message: 飞行数据可以保存到板载的SD卡槽。
sdcardNote.english: Flight logs can be recorded to your flight controller's onboard SD card slot.

dataflashNote.message: 飞行数据可以保存到板载的闪存内。
dataflashNote.english: Flight logs can be recorded to your flight controller's onboard dataflash chip.

dataflashNotPresentNote.message: 你的飞控没有可用的闪存芯片。
dataflashNotPresentNote.english: Your flight controller does not have a compatible dataflash chip available.

dataflashFirmwareUpgradeRequired.message: 板载闪存需要固件版本 >= 1.8.0。

dataflashSavetoFileNote.message:
直接将闪存保存到文件是的速度是比较缓慢的，且容易发生内部错误/文件损坏。
在某些情况下，它将适用于小文件， 但我们并不支持这样做，并且相关的支持请求将会被关闭且不会得到回复 - 请使用大容量存储模式。
dataflashSavetoFileNote.english:
Directly saving flash to file is slow and inherently prone to error / file corruption.
In some cases it will work for small files, but this is not supported and support requests for it will be closed without comment - use Mass Storage mode instead.

dataflashSaveFileDepreciationHint.message: 这种方法比较慢，因为MSP连接本身对文件传输有限制。推荐的方法是使用 '$t(blackboxRebootMscText.message)' （下方）激活海量存储模式，并将您的飞控作为存储设备来下载日志文件。
dataflashSaveFileDepreciationHint.english: This method is slow, because the MSP connection itself has fundamental limitations for file transfer. The recommended method is to use '$t(blackboxRebootMscText.message)' (below) to activate the Mass Storage Mode, and access your flight controller as a storage device to download the log files.

dataflashConfirmEraseNote.message: 这将会擦除闪存里面保存的所有黑盒日志。它将耗时20秒左右，确定继续？
dataflashConfirmEraseNote.english: This will erase any Blackbox logs or other data contained in the dataflash. It should take about 20 seconds, are you sure?

dataflashSavingTitle.message: 正在保存闪存数据到文件

dataflashSavingNote.message: 保存闪存数据到文件可能会需要几分钟，请等待。
dataflashSavingNote.english: Saving could take several minutes, please wait.

dataflashSavingNoteAfter.message: 保存成功，点击 “确认” 继续

dataflashFileWriteFailed.message: 写入文件失败，请确认文件和文件夹权限。
dataflashFileWriteFailed.english: Failed to write to the file you selected, are the permissions on that folder okay?

firmwareFlasherTargetWarning.message: 重要：请选择飞控对应的固件，如果烧写错误的固件将会导致 糟糕 的事发生。
firmwareFlasherTargetWarning.english: IMPORTANT: Ensure you flash a file appropriate for your target. Flashing a binary for the wrong target can cause bad things to happen.

firmwareFlasherLoadedConfig.message: 已加载目标，请加载固件文件
firmwareFlasherLoadedConfig.english: Loaded target, please load firmware file

firmwareFlasherOnlineSelectBoardHint.message: 统一目标的概念意味着使用相同 MCU（G4、F4、F7、H7）的所有电路板均可使用相同的固件 .hex 文件。为了让不同的电路板使用相同的固件，需要在固件烧写的同时写入单独的配置文件。
firmwareFlasherOnlineSelectBoardHint.english:
The concept of Unified Targets means that the same firmware .hex file can be used for all boards using the same MCU (G4, F4, F7, H7). To make the different boards work with the same firmware, a separate configuration file is flashed alongside the firmware.
The Configurator supports this transparently in one flashing step.

firmwareFlasherWarningText.message:
请仅使用此固件刷写器刷写 Rotorflight 或 Betaflight 硬件。

注意：STM32 引导加载程序存储在 ROM 中，不会出现变砖的情况。
注意： 在使用固件刷新程序时，自动连接（Auto-Connect）功能始终处于禁用状态。
注意：确保有备份；某些升级/降级会清除你的配置。
注意： 如果在刷写过程中遇到问题，请先断开 FC 上的所有电缆连接，尝试重启并升级驱动程序。
注意： 在刷写直接连接 USB 插座的电路板（大多数较新的电路板）时，确保已阅读手册中的 USB 刷写部分，并安装了正确的软件和驱动程序。
firmwareFlasherWarningText.english:
Please do ONLY flash Rotorflight or Betaflight hardware with this firmware flasher.

Note: STM32 bootloader is stored in ROM, it cannot be bricked.
Note: Auto-Connect is always disabled while you are inside firmware flasher.
Note: Make sure you have a backup; some upgrades/downgrades will wipe your configuration.
Note: If you have problems flashing try disconnecting all cables from your FC first, try rebooting, upgrade drivers.
Note: When flashing boards that have directly connected USB sockets (most newer boards) ensure you have read the USB Flashing section of the manual and have the correct software and drivers installed

firmwareFlasherRecoveryText.message:
如果与飞控板失去通信，请按照以下步骤恢复通信：
  • 断开电源
  • 启用无序列重启以及全盘擦除
  • 按下或短接BOOT按钮
  • 接通电源（如果操作正确，活动 LED 指示灯不会闪烁）。
  • 如果需要请安装所有 STM32 驱动 以及 Zadig (参见手册中的 USB 刷写 部分)。
  • 关闭并重启配置器
  • 如果飞控板有 BOOT 按钮，此时松开 BOOT 按钮
  • 使用正确的固件刷写（如果 FC 手册有规定，请使用手动波特率）。
  • 断开电源
  • 移除 BOOT 跳线
  • 接通电源（活动 LED 应闪烁）。
  • 正常连接
firmwareFlasherRecoveryText.english:
If you have lost communication with your board follow these steps to restore communication:
  • Power off
  • Enable 'No reboot sequence', enable 'Full chip erase'.
  • Jumper the BOOT pins or hold BOOT button.
  • Power on (activity LED will NOT flash if done correctly).
  • Install all STM32 drivers and Zadig if required (see USB Flashing section of the manual).
  • Close configurator, Restart Configurator.
  • Release BOOT button if your FC has one.
  • Flash with correct firmware (using manual baud rate if specified in your FC's manual).
  • Power off.
  • Remove BOOT jumper.
  • Power on (activity LED should flash).
  • Connect normally.

unstableFirmwareAcknoledgementDialog.message:
您将要刷入一个开发版本固件。这些固件仍在开发中，并且可能会造成下列问题：
  • 固件完全不工作；
  • 固件无法飞行；
  • 固件存在安全性问题
  • 固件可能会造成飞控变砖，甚至损坏；
如果您继续刷入此固件，您将对上述所有风险承担全部责任。此外，您需要明白，您必须在尝试解锁起飞之前卸下桨叶并进行必要的测试。
unstableFirmwareAcknoledgementDialog.english:
You are about to flash a development build of the firmware. These builds are a work-in-progress, and any of the following can be the case:
  • the firmware does not work at all;
  • the firmware is not flyable;
  • there are safety issues with the firmware, for example flyaways
  • the firmware can cause the flight controller to become unresponsive, or damaged
If you proceed with flashing this firmware, you are assuming full responsibility for the risk of any of the above happening. Furthermore you acknowledge that it is necessary to perform thorough bench tests with rotor blades removed before any attempts to fly this firmware.

unstableFirmwareAcknoledgementAcknowledg.message: 我已阅读上述声明并且<strong>我自愿承担刷入不稳定版本固件的一切后果<strong>
unstableFirmwareAcknoledgementAcknowledg.english: I have read the above and <strong>I assume full responsibility<strong> for flashing unstable firmware

profilesErrorLimitHelp.message: PID 循环中角度误差的硬限制。绝对误差以及 I 项永远不会超过这些限制。
profilesErrorLimitHelp.english: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.

profilesOffsetLimitHelp.message: PID 循环中偏移角的硬限制。绝对偏移量以及 O 项增益(高速优化)永远不会超过这些限制。
profilesOffsetLimitHelp.english: Hard limit for the High Speed Integral offset angle in the PID loop. The absolute offset and thus the O-term will never go above these limits.

profilesOffsetLimitRoll.english: HSI Offset Limit for Roll Axis [°]

profilesOffsetLimitPitch.english: HSI Offset Limit for Pitch Axis [°]

profilesOffsetGainHelp.message: 高速积分偏移项的增益（O增益），仅在大螺距时有效。该增益可在高速飞行时提供角度稳定性和安全的控制跟随，并在旋翼面角度发生较大变化时提供姿态稳定性，如果没有O增益，这些变化将导致弹跳和姿态偏移。过低的数值会导致直升机在高速飞行时变得不稳定，以及在螺距变化时反应缓慢和姿态变化过大。过大的数值会导致在大螺距下出现振荡和不稳定。为了测试参数的下限，请在 安全高度 上进行直线飞行，仅短暂地将集体螺距拉到负值并观察直升机的反应。如果直升机出现弹跳，则增加O增益。为了测试参数的上限，可在大螺距垂直爬升时短促摇动升降舵和副翼，观察直升机的反应。如果直升机在松开摇杆后出现摇摆，则减小O增益。
profilesOffsetGainHelp.english: Gain for the High Speed Integral Offset term (Integral for high speed flight), which is only active at large collective angles. This term of the control loop provides angular stability and safe control following at high speeds, as well as attitude stability on large changes of the collective pitch angle of the rotor disk, which would lead to rapid diving and unwanted attitude changes without HSI. Too low values cause the model to become unstable at high speeds, as well as slow reaction and large attitude changes on collective pitch changes. Too large values can cause oscillation and restlessness at large collective pitch angles. For testing of the lower bounds of the parameter, fly in a straight line AT SAFE ALTITUDE, only briefly pull the collective into the negative range and observe the model's reaction. Should the model dive, increase the HSI Offset Gain. For testing the upper bounds of the parameter, give short jabs of elevator and aileron in a high collective vertical climb and observe the model's behavior. If the model swings, wobbles or exerts restlessness after releasing the stick, decrease the HSI Offset Gain.

profilesOffsetGainRoll.english: HSI Offset Gain for Roll Axis

profilesOffsetGainPitch.english: HSI Offset Gain for Pitch Axis

profilesErrorDecayTimeGroundHelp.message: 当直升机不在空中时，释放当前控制器的误差。这有助于防止直升机在地面上翻倒。
profilesErrorDecayTimeGroundHelp.english: Bleeds off the current controller error when the craft is not airborne. This helps preventing the craft from tipping over on the ground.

profilesErrorDecayTimeCyclicHelp.message: 消除累积俯仰/横滚误差的时间常数(I增益)。较长的衰减时间使悬停更稳定，但可能会降低3D性能。
profilesErrorDecayTimeCyclicHelp.english: Time constant for bleeding off the accumulated cyclic error (I-term). Longer decay time makes hovering more stable, but may reduce 3D performance.

profilesErrorDecayLimitCyclic.message: 误差衰减最大速率 [&度;/秒]

profilesErrorDecayLimitCyclicHelp.message: 累积俯仰/横滚误差的最大衰减速度(I增益)。
profilesErrorDecayLimitCyclicHelp.english: Maximum bleed-off speed for the accumulated cyclic error (I-term).

profilesErrorDecayTimeYawHelp.message: 消除累积航向误差的时间常数(I增益)。
profilesErrorDecayTimeYawHelp.english: Time constant for bleeding off the accumulated yaw error (I-term).

profilesErrorDecayLimitYaw.message: 误差衰减最大速率 [&度;/秒]

profilesErrorDecayLimitYawHelp.message: 累积航向误差的最大衰减速度(I增益)。
profilesErrorDecayLimitYawHelp.english: Maximum bleed-off speed for the accumulated yaw error (I-term).

profilesErrorRotationHelp.message: 当直升机机身旋转时，围绕航向轴旋转当前的横滚和俯仰误差项。这改进了自旋的控制，使直升机在自旋中保持稳定。
profilesErrorRotationHelp.english: Rotates the current Roll and Pitch Error Terms around Yaw when the craft rotates. This improves piro control and helps the model to travel in a straight line while pirouetting.

profilesItermRelaxHelp.message: 快速打杆(俯仰/横滚/航向)时，可限制 I-term的累积。这有助于减少翻滚和其他快速运动结束时的反弹。
profilesItermRelaxHelp.english: Limits the accumulation of I-term when fast movements happen. This helps in the reduction of bounceback at the end of rolls and other fast movements.

profilesItermRelaxTypeHelp.message:
选择使用 I-Term 释放的轴。
RP: 横滚，俯仰
RPY: 横滚，俯仰，航向
profilesItermRelaxTypeHelp.english:
Choose the axes in which this is active.
RP: Roll, Pitch
RPY: Roll, Pitch, Yaw.

profilesItermRelaxCutoffHelp.message:
较低的数值可抑制移动后的反弹，较高的数值可提高高速旋转的精确度。
小型直升机设置为15-30, 中型直升机设置为10-15，大型直升机设置为小于10。
profilesItermRelaxCutoffHelp.english:
Lower values suppress bounce-back after movements, high values increase high-rate turn precision.
Set to 15-30 for small helis, 10-15 for mid-size, and less than 10 for large.

profilesGyroCutoffHelp.english: PID Loop overall bandwidth in Hz

profilesAcroTrainerGainHelp.message: 手动模式教练增益。Acro 教练模式直升机不会自动回正，但可以限制最大横滚/俯仰角度。这决定了在 Acro 教练模式下，直升机超过最大角度时，会有多大的强度纠正姿态。
profilesAcroTrainerGainHelp.english: Acro Trainer gain. Acro trainer Mode is not self leveling but does limit the maximum pitch/roll angle. This determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to the maximum angle (if exceeded) while in Acro Trainer Mode

profilesAcroTrainerLimit.message: 手动模式教练角度限制

profilesAcroTrainerLimitHelp.message: 手动模式教练角度限制。Acro 教练模式不会自动回正（与自稳或半自稳模式一样），但会限制直升机俯仰/横滚的最大角度。
profilesAcroTrainerLimitHelp.english: Acro Trainer angle limit. Acro Trainer mode does not self level (like Angle or Horizon Modes); however, it does limit the maximum angle the helicopter will pitch/roll to

profilesPitchFFCollectiveGainHelp.english: Amount of collective mixed into the elevator control.

profilesCyclicCrossCouplingHelp.message: 当只使用升降舵时，循环螺距交叉耦合补偿可消除副翼（横滚）摆动。
profilesCyclicCrossCouplingHelp.english: Cyclic Cross-Coupling compensation removes the aileron (roll) wobble when only elevator is applied.

profilesCyclicCrossCouplingGainHelp.message: 对俯仰-横滚解耦所应用的补偿量
profilesCyclicCrossCouplingGainHelp.english: Amount of compensation applied for Pitch-to-Roll decoupling.

profilesCyclicCrossCouplingRatioHelp.message: 所需的横滚-俯仰补偿量与俯仰-横滚补偿量的比率。
profilesCyclicCrossCouplingRatioHelp.english: Amount of Roll-to-Pitch compensation needed, vs. Pitch-to-Roll.

profilesCyclicCrossCouplingCutoffHelp.message: 补偿的频率限制。数值越大补偿动作越快。
profilesCyclicCrossCouplingCutoffHelp.english: Frequency limit for the compensation. Higher value will make the compensation action faster.

profilesRescueFlipModeHelp.message: 如果在倒飞时激活救机，直升机将会翻滚回正
profilesRescueFlipModeHelp.english: If rescue is activated while inverted, flip to upright - or remain inverted

profilesRescueLevelGainHelp.message: 启用救机后直升机回正的强度
profilesRescueLevelGainHelp.english: Gain to determine how aggressively the heli levels during rescue.

profilesRescueFlipGainHelp.message: 救援过程中，直升机在执行翻正时的强度。
profilesRescueFlipGainHelp.english: Gain to determine how aggressively the heli flips during inverted rescue.

profilesRescueMaxRateHelp.message: 限制回正时的滚转速率，较大的直升机需要慢一点的速率.
profilesRescueMaxRateHelp.english: Limit rescue roll/pitch rate. Larger helicopters may need slower rotation rates.

profilesRescueMaxAccelHelp.message: 限制直升机加速滚转的速度。较大的直升机可能需要较慢的加速度。
profilesRescueMaxAccelHelp.english: Limit how fast the helicopter accelerates into a roll/pitch. Larger helicopters may need slower acceleration.

profilesRescuePullupCollectiveHelp.message: 启动救机时瞬间拉升的集体螺距.

profilesRescuePullupTimeHelp.message: 救机拉升时间。启动救机时，直升机将在这段时间内拉升集体螺距，然后进入翻转或爬升阶段。
profilesRescuePullupTimeHelp.english: Rescue pull-up time. When Rescue activated Helicopter will apply pull-up collective for this time period before moving to flip or climb stage.

profilesRescueClimbCollectiveHelp.message: 救机后向上爬升时的集体螺距值

profilesRescueClimbTimeHelp.message: 在切换到悬停之前，爬升螺距的持续时间
profilesRescueClimbTimeHelp.english: Length of time the climb collective is applied before switching to hover.

profilesRescueHoverCollectiveHelp.message: 救机后悬停时的螺距值

profilesRescueExitTimeHelp.message: 在此期间，螺距将受到限制，以便平稳过渡到正常飞行。如果直升机在救援过程中发生翻滚，这将限制负螺距的快速响应。
profilesRescueExitTimeHelp.english: Collective is rate limited during this period to provide smooth transition to normal flight. This limits rapid application of negative collective if the Helicopter has rolled during rescue

profilesRescueFlipTimeHelp.message: 翻正失败超时。当在救机过程中，直升机将尝试翻正，但在规定时间内没有成功翻正时，将会终止救机
profilesRescueFlipTimeHelp.english: Timeout for flip failure. If the helicopter is in rescue and is trying to flip to upright and does not do with the Rescue Flip Time, rescue will be aborted

profilesRescueMaxCollectiveHelp.message: 高度控制时的最大集体螺距
profilesRescueMaxCollectiveHelp.english: Maximum Collective to apply for altitude control

rateSetupTuningHelp.message: 速率与Expo：根据这些参数来决定你的操控手感。使用图形和实时3D模型来找到您最喜欢的速率设定。
rateSetupTuningHelp.english: Rates and Expo: Determine your stick feel based on these parameters. Use the graph and live 3D model to find your favourite rate setting.

rateSetupRatesTypeTip.message: 改变速率类型将改变速率曲线及配置方式
rateSetupRatesTypeTip.english: Changing rates type will change the rates curve and the way you can set it

rateSetupRatesCurveTip.message: 尝试不同的速率参数并观察它如何影响摇杆曲线
rateSetupRatesCurveTip.english: Play with the rates and see how those affect the stick curve

gyroDTermFilterSettings.message: 陀螺仪 D-term 滤波器设置

gyroLowpassFrequency.message: 陀螺仪低通滤波器 1 截止频率 [Hz]

gyroLowpassType.message: 陀螺仪低通滤波器 1 类型

gyroLowpassDynMinFrequency.message: 陀螺仪低通滤波器 1 动态滤波器最小截止频率 [Hz]
gyroLowpassDynMinFrequency.english: Gyro Lowpass 1 Dynamic Min Cutoff Frequency [Hz]

gyroLowpassDynMaxFrequency.message: 陀螺仪低通滤波器 1 动态滤波器最大截止频率 [Hz]
gyroLowpassDynMaxFrequency.english: Gyro Lowpass 1 Dynamic Max Cutoff Frequency [Hz]

gyroLowpass2Frequency.message: 陀螺仪低通滤波器 2 截止频率 [Hz]

gyroLowpass2Type.message: 陀螺仪低通滤波器 2 类型

gyroLowpassFilterHelp.message: 陀螺仪低通滤波器用于消除陀螺仪信号中多余的噪声。  可使用两个滤波器，一阶或二阶均可。  第一个滤波器可以是动态的，随主旋翼转速改变其截止频率。  最小和最大值限制了动态范围。  使用转速滤波器或动态陷波滤波器时，需要在 100Hz 左右增加一个滤波器。  如果没有这些滤波器，则需要两个二阶滤波器。
gyroLowpassFilterHelp.english: The Gyro Lowpass Filters are used for cutting off excess noise in the gyro signal. Two filters can be used, either 1<sup>st</sup> or 2<sup>nd</sup> order. The first filter can be dynamic, changing its cutoff frequency with the main rotor RPM. The minimum and maximum are limiting the dynamic range. With RPM Filters or Dynamic Notch Filters, one extra filter is needed around 100Hz. Without them, two second order filters are required.

gyroNotch1Frequency.message: 陀螺仪陷波器 1 中心频率 [Hz]

gyroNotch2Frequency.message: 陀螺仪陷波器 2 中心频率 [Hz]

gyroNotch1Cutoff.message: 陀螺仪陷波器 1 截止频率 [Hz]

gyroNotch2Cutoff.message: 陀螺仪陷波器 2 截止频率 [Hz]

gyroNotchFilterHelp.message: 陷波滤波器用于滤除额外的共振。每个滤波器都有一个中心和一个截止。中心频率是滤波器的中心，截止频率是滤波器开始的位置。例如，截止频率为160，中心频率为260，这意味着范围为160- 360hz，中心附近衰减最多。
gyroNotchFilterHelp.english: The Notch Filters are used for filtering out additional resonances. Each filter has a Center and a Cutoff. The Center Frequency is the center of the filter and the Cutoff Frequency is where filter starts. For example with cutoff of 160 and center of 260, it means the range is 160-360Hz with most attenuation around the center.

gyroDynamicNotchFilterSettings.message: 陀螺仪动态陷波滤波器设置

gyroDynamicNotchFilterHelp.message: 动态陷波器将会自动识别陀螺仪信号中的峰值噪声频率，并将滤波器作用于该频率上。
gyroDynamicNotchFilterHelp.english: Dynamic Notch Filter tracks peak noise frequencies in the gyro signal and places notch filters at those frequencies automatically.

gyroDynamicNotchQ.message: 动态陷波器 Q 因子

gyroDynamicNotchCountHelp.message: 选择动态陷波滤波器的数量, 如果不带 RPM 滤波器答单独使用，建议使用 4-6个。使用 RPM 滤波器时，建议使用 2-4个。
gyroDynamicNotchCountHelp.english: Select the number of dynamic notch filters. If used standalone without the RPM filters, 4-6 is recommended. With the RPM filters, 2-4 is recommended.

gyroDynamicNotchQHelp.message: Q因子调整了动态陷波滤波器的宽度。更高的值将使其变得更窄，较低的值将使其变得更宽。 建议设置为2.0 至 4.0 ，低于2.0将会明显增加延迟并影响飞行性能。
gyroDynamicNotchQHelp.english: The Q factor adjusts how wide the dynamic notch filters are. A higher value makes it narrower and more selective, and a lower value makes it wider and broader. Values between 2.0 and 4.0 are recommended. A value lower than 2.0 will greatly increase filter delay and may degrade flight performance.

gyroDynamicNotchMinHzHelp.message: 将其设置为需要过滤的最低传入噪声频率。应低于主旋翼频率，但不低于 20Hz，相当于 1200rpm。
gyroDynamicNotchMinHzHelp.english: Set this to the lowest incoming noise frequency that is needed to be filtered. Should be lower than main rotor frequency, but no lower that 20Hz, which is equivalent to 1200rpm.

gyroDynamicNotchMaxHzHelp.message: 将其设置为需要过滤的最高传入噪声频率。如果滤波器频率为 1k，则应比最大尾旋翼频率高 10-20%，但不高于 250Hz。如果滤波器频率为 2k 或更高，则可使用 330-500 Hz，特别是对于电机直驱尾旋翼的小型直升机（范围越大，精度越低，性能越差）。
gyroDynamicNotchMaxHzHelp.english: Set this to the highest incoming noise frequency that is needed to be filtered. Should be 10-20% higher than the max tail rotor frequency, but no higher than 250Hz, if filter rate is 1k. If filter rate is 2k or higher, then 330-500 Hz can be used, especially for smaller helis with a motorised tail (higher range means less precision and lower performance).

gyroDTermLowpassType.message: D Term 低通滤波器 1 类型

gyroDTermLowpassFrequency.message: D 低通滤波器 1 截止频率 [Hz]

gyroDTermLowpass2Frequency.message: D 低通滤波器 2 截止频率 [Hz]

gyroDTermLowpass2Type.message: D Term 低通滤波器 2 类型

gyroDTermLowpassDynMinFrequency.message: D Term 低通动态滤波器 1 最小截止频率 [Hz]
gyroDTermLowpassDynMinFrequency.english: D Term Lowpass 1 Dynamic Min Cutoff Frequency [Hz]

gyroDTermLowpassDynMaxFrequency.message: D Term 低通动态滤波器 1 最大截止频率 [Hz]
gyroDTermLowpassDynMaxFrequency.english: D Term Lowpass 1 Dynamic Max Cutoff Frequency [Hz]

gyroDTermNotchFrequency.message: D Term 陷波滤波器中心频率 [Hz]
gyroDTermNotchFrequency.english: D Term Notch Filter Center Frequency [Hz]

gyroDTermNotchCutoff.message: D Term 陷波滤波器截止频率 [Hz]
gyroDTermNotchCutoff.english: D Term Notch Filter Cutoff Frequency [Hz]

gyroRpmFilterSettings.message: 陀螺仪转速陷波滤波器设置

gyroRpmFilterConfigNote.message: 警告： RPM滤波器要求通过Dshot遥测或RPM回传线获得精确的电机转速。电调遥测获得的转速不适合使用。
gyroRpmFilterConfigNote.english: Warning: RPM Notch Filter requires a reliable motor RPM, either from Dshot RPM telemetry or an RPM Sensor. ESC telemetry is not suitable.

gyroRpmFilterCustomNote.message:
警告：自定义转速滤波器使用中.
请使用CLI进行RPM滤波器设置。
gyroRpmFilterCustomNote.english:
Warning: Custom RPM Notch Filter configuration is in use.
Please use the CLI to change the RPM Filter settings.

gyroRpmFilterMainRotorMinRPMHelp.message: 滤波器接受的最小主旋翼转速
gyroRpmFilterMainRotorMinRPMHelp.english: Minimum Main Rotor RPM accepted by the filters

gyroRpmFilterTailRotorMinRPMHelp.message: 滤波器接受的最小尾旋翼转速
gyroRpmFilterTailRotorMinRPMHelp.english: Minimum Tail Rotor RPM accepted by the filters

gyroRpmFilterHelp.message:
转速控制滤波是陀螺上的一组陷波滤波器，它利用转速遥测数据以外科手术般精准去除噪声。

重要: 电调必须支持双向DShot协议，并且$t(tabmotors.com message)选项卡中的$t(configurationMotorPoles.message)的值必须正确才能使此过滤器工作。
gyroRpmFilterHelp.english:
RPM controlled filtering is a bank of notch filters on gyro which use the RPM telemetry data to remove noise with surgical precision.

IMPORTANT: The ESC must support the Bidirectional Dshot protocol and the value of the $t(configurationMotorPoles.message) in the $t(tabMotors.message) tab must be correct for this filter to work.

gyroRpmFilterMainRotorHelp.message: 针对主旋翼谐波的转速控制滤波器
gyroRpmFilterMainRotorHelp.english: RPM controlled filters for the main rotor harmonics

gyroRpmFilterTailRotorHelp.message: 针对尾旋翼谐波的转速控制滤波器
gyroRpmFilterTailRotorHelp.english: RPM controlled filters for the tail rotor harmonics

gyroRpmFilterMainMotorHelp.message: 针对主电机谐波的转速控制滤波器
gyroRpmFilterMainMotorHelp.english: RPM controlled filters for the main motor harmonics

gyroRpmFilterTailMotorHelp.message: 针对尾电机谐波的转速控制滤波器
gyroRpmFilterTailMotorHelp.english: RPM controlled filters for the tail motor harmonics

gyroRpmFilterQ1.message: 基频陷波 Q 因子

gyroRpmFilterQ2.message: 2<sup>nd</sup> 谐波陷波 Q 因子

gyroRpmFilterQ3.message: 3<sup>rd</sup> 谐波陷波 Q 因子

gyroRpmFilterQ4.message: 4<sup>th</sup> 谐波陷波 Q 因子

gyroRpmFilterQ5.message: 5<sup>th</sup> 谐波陷波 Q 因子

gyroRpmFilterQ6.message: 6<sup>th</sup> 谐波陷波 Q 因子

gyroRpmFilterQ7.message: 7<sup>th</sup> 谐波陷波 Q 因子

gyroRpmFilterQ8.message: 8<sup>th</sup> 谐波陷波 Q 因子

dialogGyroResetTitle.message: 警告: 转速滤波器重置

dialogGyroResetNote.message: 更改设置类型会将任何自定义转速滤波器设置重置为默认值。
dialogGyroResetNote.english: Changing the Setup Type will reset any custom RPM filter settings to defaults.

failsafeFeaturesHelpNew.message:
失控保护有两个阶段。若飞控在任一接收通道收到无效的脉冲长度，或者接收机汇报已失控，或者彻底没有收到接收机信号，飞控将进入一阶失控保护状态。飞控将会在所有通道使用预置通道设置，如果短时间内信号恢复将可退出失控保护状态。若直升机处于解锁状态，并且一阶失控保护模式持续时间超过了预设的时间，飞控将进入二价失控保护状态，所有通道将会保持当前输出。
注意： 在飞控进入一阶失控保护之前，如果AUX 通道出现无效的脉冲，该通道一样会使用预置通道设置。
failsafeFeaturesHelpNew.english:
Failsafe has two stages. Stage 1 is entered when a flightchannel has an invalid pulse length, the receiver reports failsafe mode or there is no signal from the receiver at all, the channel fallback settings are applied to all channels and a short amount of time is provided to allow for recovery. Stage 2 is entered when the error condition takes longer than the configured guard time while the craft is armed, all channels will remain at the applied channel fallback setting unless overruled by the chosen procedure.
Note: Prior to entering stage 1, channel fallback settings are also applied to individual AUX channels that have invalid pulses.

failsafePulsrangeHelp.message: 脉冲长度小于最小，或者超过最大，都会被认为是无效脉冲。将会触发单个通道的预置设置覆盖，或引起一阶失控保护。
failsafePulsrangeHelp.english: Pulses shorter than minimum or longer than maximum are invalid and will trigger application of individual channel fallback settings for AUX channels or entering stage 1 for flightchannels

failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsHelp.message: 当进入一阶失控保护时，这些设置将会应用于单独无效的AUX 通道，或者是所有通道。注意：数值应是5us的整数倍，小于5us的设置会被上下取整。
failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsHelp.english: These settings are applied to invalid individual AUX channels or to all channels when entering stage 1. Note: values are saved in steps of 5µs, so smaller changes may be ignored.

failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsAuto.message: 自动 指的是 横滚、俯仰、方向都回中，油门最低。 保持 指的是 所有通道保持最后从接收机接收到的有效的数值。
failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsAuto.english: Auto means Roll, Pitch and Yaw to center and Throttle low. Hold means maintain the last good value received

failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsHold.message: 保持指的是 所有通道保持最后接收到的有效的数值。设置 指的是 通道使用在这里设定的值。
failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsHold.english: Hold means maintain the last good value received. Set means the value given here will be used

failsafeStageTwoSettingsTitle.message: 二阶失控保护 - 设置

failsafeDelayItem.message: 触发二阶失控保护的信号丢失保护时间 [秒]
failsafeDelayItem.english: Guard time for stage 2 activation after signal lost [s]

failsafeDelayHelp.message: 一阶失控保护等待信号恢复时间
failsafeDelayHelp.english: Time for stage 1 to wait for recovery

failsafeThrottleLowItem.message: 低油门失控保护延迟 [秒]

failsafeThrottleLowHelp.message: 在油门保持低位超过该时间，不再执行失控保护措施转而直接锁定电机。
failsafeThrottleLowHelp.english: Just disarm the craft instead of executing the selected failsafe procedure when the throttle was low for this amount of time

failsafeOffDelayItem.message: 失控保护过程中关闭电机延时 [秒]
failsafeOffDelayItem.english: Delay for turning off the Motors during Failsafe [s]

failsafeOffDelayHelp.message: 暂时保持在降落模式而不锁定电机的时间
failsafeOffDelayHelp.english: Time to stay in landing mode until the motors are turned off and the craft is disarmed

failsafeGpsRescueItemAllowArmingWithoutF.message: 允许在未锁定的情况下解锁 - 警告: 这样将无法使用GPS救援
failsafeGpsRescueItemAllowArmingWithoutF.english: Allow arming without fix - WARNING: the GPS Rescue will not be available

failsafeKillSwitchItem.message: 失控保护开关 （在模式页面设置失控保护模式）
failsafeKillSwitchItem.english: Failsafe Kill Switch (setup Failsafe in Modes Tab)

failsafeKillSwitchHelp.message: 设置这个选项会使失控保护开关(模式页面设置)作为直接关闭开关，将会绕开所有的失控保护检测程序。注意: 当打开失控保护开关时，解锁开关无效
failsafeKillSwitchHelp.english: Set this option to make the failsafe switch (Modes Tab) act as a direct kill switch, bypassing the selected failsafe procedure. Note: Arming is blocked with the failsafe kill switch in the ON position

failsafeSwitchModeHelp.message:
此选项确定通过辅助开关激活失控保护时发生的情况:
阶段 1 激活阶段1失控保护。如果要模拟信号丢失时的失控保护行为，此功能非常有用。
阶段 2 跳过阶段1并立即激活阶段2流程
终止 立即锁定 （你的直升机将会坠毁）
failsafeSwitchModeHelp.english:
This option determines what happens when Failsafe is activated through AUX switch:
Stage 1 activates Stage 1 failsafe. This is useful if you want to simulate the exact signal loss failsafe behavior.
Stage 2 skips Stage 1 and activates the Stage 2 procedure immediately
Kill disarms instantly (your craft will crash)

powerCalibrationManagerHelp.message: 要校准，请使用万用表测量你的直升机上(接上电池) 的实际电压/电流，然后在下方输入值。然后，在同一块电池仍然接入的情况下，点击 [Calibrate] 按钮。
powerCalibrationManagerHelp.english: To calibrate, use a multimeter to measure the actual voltage / current draw on your craft (with a battery plugged in), and enter the values below. Then, with the same battery still plugged in, click [Calibrate].

powerCalibrationManagerNote.message:
注意： 在校准缩放之前，请确保电压和电流漂移的除数和乘数设置正确。
将值设置为0将不会应用校准。
在插上电池前记得卸下桨叶！
powerCalibrationManagerNote.english:
Note: Before calibrating the scale make sure that divider and multiplier for voltage and offset for current is set properly.
Leaving the values at 0 will not apply calibration.
Remember to remove rotor blades before plugging in a battery!

powerCalibrationManagerWarning.message: 警告：电池未接入或电压计源和电流计源没有正确设置。请确保电压计和/或电流计读数超过0. 否则您将无法使用此工具进行校准。
powerCalibrationManagerWarning.english: Warning: The battery is not plugged in or voltage and current meter sources are not set properly. Make sure that the voltage and/or current are reading a value above 0. Otherwise you will not be able to calibrate using this tool.

powerCalibrationManagerSourceNote.message: 警告：电压计和/或电流计测量源已经更改，但未保存。请在校准之前设置并保存正确的测量源。
powerCalibrationManagerSourceNote.english: Warning: Voltage and/or current meter sources have been changed but not saved. Please set the correct meter sources and save them before trying to calibrate.

powerCalibrationConfirmHelp.message:
这里显示新的校准放缩表。
应用它们将会设置缩放但并不会保存。

在保存之后，请确保新的电压和电流读数正确。
powerCalibrationConfirmHelp.english:
New calibrated scales are shown here.
Applying them will set the scales but will not save them.

After saving make sure that the new voltage and current are correct.

osdSetupNoOsdChipDetectWarning.message: 警告：未检测到OSD芯片。部分飞控在未接入电池的情况下无法给OSD芯片正常供电。请在连接 USB 之前接入电池 (务必卸下螺旋桨！)
osdSetupNoOsdChipDetectWarning.english: WARNING: No OSD chip was detected. Some flight controllers will not properly power the OSD chip unless connected to battery power. Please connect the battery before connecting the USB (PROPS REMOVED!).

osdSetupPreviewHelp.message: 注意:OSD 预览可能无法显示飞控实际安装的字体。当使用旧版本的固件时，某些图标的布局位置可能会有所不同 - 请在飞行之前先通过视频眼镜检查妥当。
osdSetupPreviewHelp.english: Note: OSD preview may not show the actual font that is installed on the flight controller. The layout of individual elements may look different when older versions of the firmware are used - please check the look through your goggles before flying.

osdSetupUnsupportedNote1.message: 飞控对 OSD 命令无反应，有可能飞控不带 OSD 功能。
osdSetupUnsupportedNote1.english: Your flight controller isn't responding to OSD commands. This probably means that it does not have an integrated BetaFlight OSD.

osdSetupUnsupportedNote2.message: 注意，有的飞控带有 MinimOSD ，可以通过scarab-osd来烧录和设置，但是这样的飞控不能通过此页面来设置参数。
osdSetupUnsupportedNote2.english: Note that some flight controllers have an onboard MinimOSD that can be flashed and configured with scarab-osd, however the MinimOSD cannot be configured through this interface.

osdSetupProfilesTitle.description: Description of the header of the OSD elements column associated to each profile

osdSetupPreviewSelectProfileTitle.description: Label of the selector for the OSD Profile in the preview. KEEP IT SHORT!!!

osdSetupPreviewForTitle.message: 在此处更改配置文件或者字体仅影响预览窗口而不会改变飞控中的配置文件或者字体。如果您想更改飞控，则必须分别使用 '$t(osdSetupSelectedProfileTitle.message)' 选项或者 '$t(osdSetupFontManager.message)' 按钮。
osdSetupPreviewForTitle.english: Changing here the profile or the font will NOT change the profile or the font in the flight controller, only affects the preview window. If you want to change it, you must use the '$t(osdSetupSelectedProfileTitle.message)' option or the '$t(osdSetupFontManager.message)' button respectively.

Adds an adjustable outline element designed to represent the field of view of the pilot's HD camera for visual framing.

vtxHelp.message:
这里可以定义图传用到的值。如果你的图传支持，你可以查看和修改发送功率和图传表。
按以下步骤设置你的图传：
1. 打开这个页面；
2. 找到并下载适合你的图传型号和所在地区的图传配置文件；
3. 点击下方'$t(vtxButtonLoadFile.message)'，选择并加载图传配置文件；
4. 确认设置正确；
5. 点击'$t(vtxButtonSave.message)'保存图传设置到飞控。
6. （可选）点击'$t(vtxButtonSaveLua.message)'保存 Lua 配置文件供 Betaflight Lua 脚本使用。（在这里查看更多。）
vtxHelp.english:
Here you can configure the values for your Video Transmitter (VTX). You can view and change the transmission values, including the VTX Tables, if the flight controller and the VTX support it.
To set up your VTX use the following steps:
1. Go to this page;
2. Find the appropriate VTX configuration file for your country and your VTX model and download it;
3. Click '$t(vtxButtonLoadFile.message)' below, select the VTX configuration file, load it;
4. Verify that the settings are correct;
5. Click '$t(vtxButtonSave.message)' to store the VTX settings on the flight controller.
6. Optionally click '$t(vtxButtonSaveLua.message)' to save a lua configuration file you can use with the betaflight lua scripts (See more here.)
vtxHelp.description: Introduction message in the VTX tab

vtxMessageNotSupported.message: 注意:您的图传未配置或不支持。所以您不能在此修改图传值。只有当图传使用Tramp或SmartAudio等协议，连接到飞行控制器，并在$t(tabPorts.message)页面中正确配置后，才可以使用。
vtxMessageNotSupported.english: Attention: Your VTX is not configured or not supported. So you can't modify the VTX values from here. This will only be possible if the flight controller is attached to the VTX using some protocol like Tramp or SmartAudio and is correctly configured in the $t(tabPorts.message) tab if needed.
vtxMessageNotSupported.description: Message to show when the VTX is not supported in the VTX tab

vtxMessageTableNotConfigured.message: 注意:在使用$t(vtxSelectedMode.message)之前，必须先在下面配置并保存图传表
vtxMessageTableNotConfigured.english: Attention: You need to configure and save FIRST the VTX Table at the bottom before you can make use of the $t(vtxSelectedMode.message) fields.
vtxMessageTableNotConfigured.description: Message to show when the VTX is not supported in the VTX tab

vtxMessageFactoryBandsNotSupported.message: 注意： 选定的图传不支持以“工厂模式”设置频段，但您的部分频段设置中使用了这个功能。点击 '$t(vtxButtonSave.message)' 以修复这个问题。
vtxMessageFactoryBandsNotSupported.english: Attention: The selected VTX type does not support the 'factory' setting for bands, but some of your bands have this setting. Click '$t(vtxButtonSave.message)' to fix this.
vtxMessageFactoryBandsNotSupported.description: Message to show when the configured VTX type does not support factory bands, but one or more of the configured bands are of this type

vtxMessageVerifyTable.message: 注意:图传表内容已加载，但尚未存储至飞行控制器。您必须验证和修改部分数值，以确保其在您的国家有效且合法，然后点击$t(vtxButtonSave.message)按钮来将其储存至飞行控制器上。
vtxMessageVerifyTable.english: Attention: The values of the VTX Table have been loaded, but not yet stored on the flight controller. You must verify and modify the values to be sure that they are valid and legal in your country and then press the $t(vtxButtonSave.message) button to store them on the flight controller.

vtxPitModeHelp.message:
启用时，图传将进入功率极低的模式，可以在不影响其他飞行员的情况下对直升机进行维护。通常来说，此模式的有效范围小于5米。

注意: 一些协议，如SmartAudio，在图传上电之后无法通过软件方式开启Pit模式。
vtxPitModeHelp.english:
When enabled, the VTX enters in a very low power mode to let the quad be on at the bench without disturbing other pilots. Usually the range of this mode is less than 5m.

NOTE: Some protocols, like SmartAudio, can't enable Pit Mode via software after power-up.

vtxTablePowerLevelsTableHelp.message:
该表展示了可用于图传的不同功率。它分为两部分:
- $t(vtxTablePowerLevelsValue.message):每个功率级别都需要有一个由硬件制造商定义的值。请您联系制造商以获取正确的值，或使用Betaflight的wiki说明 VTX Table 的内容来取得一些使用样例。
-$t(vtxTablePowerLevelsLabel.message):您可以在此为您的图传的每个功率级别都设置标签。可以是数字(25, 200, 600, 1.2), 字母(OFF, MIN, MAX) 或者是数字与字母混用。

你必须仅配置符合当地法律法规的功率级别。
vtxTablePowerLevelsTableHelp.english:
This table represents the different values of power that can be used for the VTX. They are divided into two:
- $t(vtxTablePowerLevelsValue.message): each power level requires a value that is defined by the hardware manufacturer. Ask your manufacturer for the correct value or consult the Betaflight wiki of VTX Tables to grab some samples.
- $t(vtxTablePowerLevelsLabel.message): you can put here the label you want for each power level value. It can be numbers (25, 200, 600, 1.2), letters (OFF, MIN, MAX) or a mix of them.

You must configure only the power levels that are legal at your country.
vtxTablePowerLevelsTableHelp.description: Help for the table of power levels (value-label) that appears in the VTX tab

vtxTableBandTitleName.description: Text of one of the titles of the VTX Table element in the VTX tab

vtxTableBandTitleLetter.description: Text of one of the titles of the VTX Table element in the VTX tab

vtxTableBandTitleFactory.description: Text of one of the titles of the VTX Table element in the VTX tab

vtxTableBandsChannelsTableHelp.message:
该表表示可用于图传的所有频率。 您可以拥有多个频段并且您必须配置每个频段的：
- $t(vtxTableBandTitleName.message)： 您需要为此频段分配名称，例如BOSCAM_A、FATSHARK 或 RACEDAND。
- $t(vtxTableBandTitleLetter.message): 该频段的缩写。
- $t(vtxTableBandTitleFactory.message): 这指示它是否是工厂模式频段。 如果启用，Betaflight会将频段及频道号码发送到图传。 图传将使用内置频率表，在此配置的频率值仅在OSD 内和其他地方显示。 如果不启用，Betaflight将向图传发送在此配置的真正的频率值。
- 频率： 此波段频率。

记住，并非所有频率在您的国家都是合法的。 您必须将不使用的频率上的值设置为 0。
vtxTableBandsChannelsTableHelp.english:
This table represents all the frequencies that can be used for your VTX. You can have several bands and for each band you must configure:
- $t(vtxTableBandTitleName.message): Name that you want to assign to this band, like BOSCAM_A, FATSHARK or RACEBAND.
- $t(vtxTableBandTitleLetter.message): Short letter that references the band.
- $t(vtxTableBandTitleFactory.message): This indicates if it is a factory band. If enabled Betaflight sends to the VTX a band and channel number. The VTX will then use its built-in frequency table and the frequencies configured here are only to show the value in the OSD and other places. If it is not enabled, then Betaflight will send to the VTX the real frequency configured here.
- Frequencies: Frequencies for this band.

Remember that not all frequencies are legal at your country. You must put a value of zero to each frequency index that you are not allowed to use to disable it.
vtxTableBandsChannelsTableHelp.description: Help for the table of bands-channels that appears in the VTX tab

blackboxModeHelp.message:
关： 禁用日志记录。

正常： 在直升机解锁后并同时打开黑盒子开关时进行记录。

解锁后： 在直升机解锁后开始记录。

开关控制： 在打开黑盒子记录开关后开始记录。
blackboxModeHelp.english:
OFF: Disable logging.

NORMAL: Enable logging when both ARMED and BLACKBOX switch are active.

ARMED: Enable logging when ARMED.

SWITCH: Enable logging when BLACKBOX switch is active.

blackboxDeviceHelp.message:
无日志： 禁用日志记录

板载闪存： 记录到板载闪存中（如果可用）。

SD卡： 记录到SD卡中（如果可用）。

串行端口： 记录到通过串行端口连接的外部设备上（如 OpenLager），必须在配置 选项卡中将对应串口设置为“黑盒日志记录”.
blackboxDeviceHelp.english:
No Logging: Disable logging.

Onboard Flash: Log to the onboard flash chip (if available).

SD Card: Log to the onboard SD card (if available).

Serial Port: Log to an external logger device (e.g OpenLager) connected to a serial port. The serial port must to be configured to 'Blackbox Logging' on the Configuration tab.

blackboxRateOfLoggingHelp.message: 记录数据将以此速度保存到记录设备中。如果要记录到外部设备，可能需要降低速度。
blackboxRateOfLoggingHelp.english: The log data is saved to the log device with this rate. For logging to an external device, lower speed may be required.

blackboxDebugModeHelp.message: 选择要记录的 额外 数据。如果启用，黑盒日志中将添加八个额外的调试项。

cordovaWebviewEnable.message: 在设置中进入您的设备信息页面，点击构建版本数字10次以启用“开发者选项”。 在此之后，搜索并进入开发者选项，并选择 {{app}} 作为 webview 提供者。
cordovaWebviewEnable.english: Go into the tab of information about your device in the settings and tap 10 times on the build version number to enable 'Developer options'. After that, search and go in the developer options and select {{app}} as webview provider.
